long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create amazing Product guides with Professional Video with AI voiceover and zoom-in effects and Step-by-step Article with snapshots in 60+ languages using Kroto - Record, Edit, Publish!

Effortlessly transform your screen recordings into professional How-to Guides with Kroto!

This innovative Chrome extension streamlines guide creation for both video and article formats:

Capture with ease: Record your Product's feature update or Process for your Sales team directly through your browser.

AI-powered assistance: Kroto's smart AI analyzes your recording's transcript and your clicks to generate a perfect Guide with AI Voiceover in multiple accents that you can choose from.

Seamless editing: Edit your Guide with a Notion like WYSIWYG editor, add and edit snapshots, change Video background, BGM, and much more.

Publish and share in a click: Share your finished How-to Guide instantly!

Kroto empowers you to create impactful How-to Guides, perfect for:

Product managers highlighting new features
Marketing teams crafting engaging presentations
Team lead creating SOPs for new Sales hire
Educators building interactive tutorials
Anyone who wants to explain a software or website clearly

Stop wasting time! Download Kroto today and start creating professional How-to Guides in minutes!
